captions.text: Hello 1theK viewers!
I'm Loco from AOMG
Back with an album called LOCOMOTIVE
And I'm Jay Park here to support Loco, nice to meet you
It's my first EP album, called LOCOMOTIVE
It's my name plus the word motive
It also means a train engine
The album is full of songs that will power you up
We'll be performing the title song "You don't know" and "Thinking about you"
It was his song, but I stole it from him
No, I'm fine with him doing the song
The MV came out well too, so I'm satisfied
We tried to put together a really special "Special Clip"
So have fun watching
And please listen to my new album
Don't forget to keep supporting AOMG too
Yeah!
Peace
One, two, three, uh huh
I think of you again tonight
But you don't know, you don't know
I'm thinking about you even this minute
But you don't know, you don't know
I whipser, only if I could get to you
If I could run to you now
I blame the situation, it's too bad
I just imagine running into you again
Trying to make me feel better
Yes, some day I'll be able to see you again
Unlike how I check your pictures every day
The indifferent words I send
I bet you're living on without knowing anything
You'll hear the song, but you'll pass right by
The drinks I had to become brave
Made me lose the memories, the dance we had
Conversations stopped because I didn't want to go deeper
I wonder with whom you are...
You might be in another relationship
This might sound arrogant, but I hope it's not the one
I think of you again tonight
But you don't know, you don't know
I'm thinking about you even this minute
But you don't know, you don't know

This song is about you you you you you
but you don't know

This song is about you you you you you
but one two three
I know I can't lay a hand on you
You're too far, I can't make you hear me
But the desire grows in me
I hope you can feel my existence
I know I can't lay a hand on you
You're too far, I can't make you hear me
But the desire grows in me
I hope you can feel my existence
I think of you again tonight
But you don't know, you don't know
I'm thinking about you even this minute
But you don't know, you don't know

This song is about you you you you you
but you don't know

This song is about you you you you you
but one two three
A silhouette roaming around in my head
Watch again and again, it never gets old
When our eyes meet and you smile
I just can't sit still
I can't sleep because of you
You're beautiful, even your name
Breathtaking body, that voice
I can't stop thinking about all of you
Even if I act like nothing's up
Even if I try to turn my eyes to other girls
I can't get you out of my head
I can't sleep, even when I shut my eyes
I keep thinking about you
I
Keep thinking, keep thinking, keep thinking about you
Keep thinking, keep thinking, keep thinking about you
You're the baddest chick, oh
You're the baddest chick
You're the baddest chick, girl
Thinking about you
You're the baddest chick
You're the baddest chick, girl
I'm thinking about girl
Day and night
I miss you all day
There's meaningless tension in the air
Do you know what this is about?
I can't do anything
I picture a scene from a movie
It doesn't go away, never
Please be behind those doors when I open them
Even if I act like nothing's up
Even if I try to turn my eyes to other girls
I can't get you out of my head
I can't sleep, even when I shut my eyes
I keep thinking about you
I
Keep thinking, keep thinking, keep thinking about you
Keep thinking, keep thinking, keep thinking about you
You're the baddest chick, oh
You're the baddest chick
You're the baddest chick, girl
Thinking about you
I'm thinking about you
You're the baddest chick
You're the baddest chick, girl
I'm thinking about you
This rocks, I feel good, feel good
Thinking about you, I feel good, feel good
Come here, hurry up and come here
Let's get high, high
I keep thinking about you baby, keep thinking girl
Keep thinking, keep thinking, keep thinking about you
Keep thinking, keep thinking, keep thinking about you
You're the baddest chick, oh
You're the baddest chick
You're the baddest chick, girl
Thinking about you
You're the baddest chick
You're the baddest chick, girl
